snippet.title: Plants vs. Zombies Adventures Official Trailer: Now on Facebook
snippet.description:
Watch the official trailer for Plants vs. Zombies™ Adventures! 

Go beyond your yard and discover more plants, more zombies and new challenges. Battle zombies in town and on the road in an ever-expanding world of PvZ fun. It's a thrilling new way to live, grow and zap zombies! 

Play now on Facebook: 
http://bit.ly/10Kx6ll
